name: you should eat breakfast
description:
wake up, go get breakfast and find a place to eat breakfast.
use arrow keys to move. walk up to an item to interact with it.
made in bitsy. please play on your pc browser with a keyboard!

other things i've worked on can be found here! you can comment right here or on twitter/tumblr with your thoughts. if you like my work and want to support me, you can buy me a coffee!
